GS40yrasprpu:594: mukhasthaṃ kurute samyak dṛḍhavajrasamaṃ vapuḥ // YRps_2.99 //
GS40yrasprpu:597: prakāśito mayā samyak nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // YRps_2.101 //
GS40yrasprpu:599: raseṃdraḥ kāntalohaṃ ca tīkṣṇalohaṃ tathaiva ca /
GS40yrasprpu:600: abhrasatvaṃ tathā tāpya- satvaṃ hemasamanvitam // YRps_2.102 //
GS40yrasprpu:602: niṣecayedekadinaṃ paścād golaṃ tu kārayet // YRps_2.103 //
GS40yrasprpu:604: gojihvā kākamācī ca nirguṃḍī dugdhikā tathā // YRps_2.104 //
GS40yrasprpu:608: vaktre dhṛtaṃ jarāmṛtyuṃ nihanti ca na saṃśayaḥ // YRps_2.106 //
GS40yrasprpu:610: karṇe kaṇṭhe tathā haste dhāritā mastake'pi vā /
GS40yrasprpu:613: kurvanti ye tattvavido bhiṣagvarā rājñāṃ gṛhe te'pi bhavanti pūjyāḥ // YRps_2.108 //
GS40yrasprpu:614: iti paramarahasyaṃ sūtarājasya coktaṃ rasanigamamahābdher labdham etat suratnam /
GS40yrasprpu:615: sakalaguṇavariṣṭhā vādinaḥ kautukajñā nijahṛdi ca sukaṇṭhe dhārayiṣyanti tajjñāḥ // YRps_2.109 //
GS40yrasprpu:624: supayasā lavaṇena vimarditaṃ kuru bhiṣagvara yantrasurodhanam // YRps_3.3 //
GS40yrasprpu:626: upari tatra jalena niṣiñcayed iti bhaveddaradād varasūtakaḥ // YRps_3.4 //
GS40yrasprpu:628: bahuladoṣaharo'pi bhavettathā bhavati śuddhatamo daradodbhavaḥ // YRps_3.5 //
GS40yrasprpu:632: saha jalena vimṛdya ca yāmakaṃ lavaṇakāmlajalena vimiśritāḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:633: uditadhātugaṇasya ca mūṣikāṃ kuru viṣaṃ viniveśaya tatra vai // YRps_3.7 //
GS40yrasprpu:638: saghanasārarasaḥ kila kāntidas tv akhilakuṣṭhaharaḥ kathito mayā // YRps_3.9 //
GS40yrasprpu:641: praharayugmamitaṃ ca śilātale ravikareṇa vimardya vicūrṇitau // YRps_3.10 //
GS40yrasprpu:643: kuru bhiṣagvara vahnim adhastataḥ sa ca bhavedaruṇaḥ kamalacchaviḥ // YRps_3.11 //
GS40yrasprpu:645: magadhajāmadhunā saha guñjikā- trayamitaśca sadā parisevitaḥ // YRps_3.12 //
GS40yrasprpu:647: gadaharo balado'pi hi varṇado bhavati karmavipākajarogahā /
GS40yrasprpu:650: rasavidāpi rasaḥ pariśodhito vigatadoṣakṛto'pi hi gaṃdhakaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:651: vimalalohamaye kṛtakharpare hy amalasārarajaḥ parimucyatām // YRps_3.14 //
GS40yrasprpu:652: atikuśāgniyute dravati svayaṃ tadanu tatra rasaḥ parimucyatām /
GS40yrasprpu:654: tadanu kācaghaṭīṃ viniveśya vai sikatayantravareṇa hi pācitaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:656: gatabalena nareṇa susevito bhavati vājikaraḥ sukhadaḥ sadā // YRps_3.17 //
GS40yrasprpu:657: sa ca valīpalitāni vināśayec chataśaratsu nirāmayakṛtparam // YRps_3.18 //
GS40yrasprpu:660: satatameva vimardya śilātale balivasāṃ ca samāṃ kuru tadbhiṣak // YRps_3.19 //
GS40yrasprpu:661: dinamitaṃ suvimardya ca kanyakā- svarasa ainakareṇa viśoṣayet /
GS40yrasprpu:662: tadanu sūtavarasya tu kajjalīṃ rucirakācaghaṭe viniveśaya // YRps_3.20 //
GS40yrasprpu:663: divasayugmamadhaḥ kṛtavahninā sa ca bhavedaruṇaḥ kamalacchaviḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:664: sakalarogavināśanavahnikṛt balakaraḥ paramo'pi hi kāntikṛt // YRps_3.21 //
GS40yrasprpu:666: sa khalu karmavipākajarogahā viśadanāgayutaḥ khalu pāradaḥ // YRps_3.22 //
GS40yrasprpu:668: mṛdumṛdā racitā masṛṇeṣṭikā upari gartavareṇa ca saṃyutā /
GS40yrasprpu:669: rasavaraṃ daśaśāṇamitaṃ hi tat saśukapicchavareṇa nidhāpayet // YRps_3.23 //
GS40yrasprpu:671: sthagaya taṃ ca pidhānavareṇa vai mṛditayā sumṛdā parimudritam // YRps_3.24 //
GS40yrasprpu:672: tadanu kukkuṭānāṃ puṭe śṛto hupalakena vanodbhavakena vai /
GS40yrasprpu:673: vidhividā bhiṣajā hyamunā kṛto vimalaṣaḍguṇagandhakam aśnute // YRps_3.25 //
GS40yrasprpu:674: sa ca śarīrakaro'pyatha lohakṛt sakalasiddhikaraḥ paramo bhavet /
GS40yrasprpu:675: śataguṇaṃ hi yadā parijīryate rasavaraḥ khalu hemakaro bhavet // YRps_3.26 //
GS40yrasprpu:677: saśukapicchasamo'pi hi pārado bhavati khalvatalena ca kuṭṭitaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:679: upari nāgarasena vilepitā ravikareṇa sadā pariśoṣitām /
GS40yrasprpu:680: kanakapatrarasena ca saptadhāpy avanigartatale viniveśaya // YRps_3.28 //
GS40yrasprpu:682: sikatayā paripūrya tadardhakaṃ tadanu tatra niveśaya poṭṭalīm // YRps_3.29 //
GS40yrasprpu:683: upari vālukayā paripūrya tac chagaṇakaiśca puṭaṃ paridīyatām /
GS40yrasprpu:684: dvidaśayāmam athāgnimaho kuru bhavati tena mahārasapoṭalī /
GS40yrasprpu:685: iti mayā kathitā rasapoṭalī balakarā sukarā sukhasiddhidā // YRps_3.30 //
GS40yrasprpu:687: viśadasūtasamo'pi hi gaṃdhakas tadanu khalvatale suvimarditaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:688: tridinameva hi haṃsapadīrase dinakarasya kareṇa suśoṣitaḥ // YRps_3.31 //
GS40yrasprpu:689: vimalalohamaye dṛḍhakharpare tadanu kajjalikāṃ pratimucya vai /
GS40yrasprpu:690: karamitā sukṛtāpi hi cuhlikā hy upari tatra niveśaya ca bhājanaṃ // YRps_3.32 //
GS40yrasprpu:691: amalalohamayena ca darviṇā rasavaraṃ niyataṃ parimardayet /
GS40yrasprpu:692: tadanu vahnimadhaḥ kuru vai dṛḍhaṃ satatameva hi yāmacatuṣṭayam // YRps_3.33 //
GS40yrasprpu:693: supaca eṣa raso jaladopamo bhavati vallamito madhunā yutaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:694: kavalitaḥ kṣayarogagaṇāpaho madanavṛddhikaraḥ paramo nṛṇām // YRps_3.34 //
GS40yrasprpu:695: sa ca valīpalitāni vināśayet sakalakuṣṭhavināśakaraḥ paraḥ // YRps_3.35 //
GS40yrasprpu:698: rasavaraṃ vimalaṃ ca suśobhitaṃ saśukapicchasamaṃ parimarditam // YRps_3.36 //
GS40yrasprpu:700: kanakamūlarasena ca pācitaṃ tadanu saptadinaṃ kṛśavahninā // YRps_3.37 //
GS40yrasprpu:701: rasavarasya śubhaṃ hi vipācanaṃ yavamito rasarājavaras tadā /
GS40yrasprpu:702: dinamukhe pratihanti subhakṣitaḥ sakaladoṣakṛtāṃ vikṛtiṃ jayet // YRps_3.38 //
GS40yrasprpu:705: balivasāṃ ca ghṛtena vimardayed atikṛśāgnikṛte dravati svayam // YRps_3.39 //
GS40yrasprpu:706: tadanu tāmrarasau viniveśyatāṃ trayamidaṃ sarasaṃ ca vimarditam /
GS40yrasprpu:707: drutamayaṃ ca sadāyasabhājane tadanu sūtakṛtāṃ varakajjalīm // YRps_3.40 //
GS40yrasprpu:709: bhavati sāratamā rasaparpaṭī sakalarogavighātakarī hi sā // YRps_3.41 //
GS40yrasprpu:710: kuru samānakaṭutrayasaṃyutāṃ maricayugmamitāṃ sukhadāṃ sadā // YRps_3.42 //
GS40yrasprpu:722: āruṣkareṇa sahitā sā tu sidhmavināśinī // YRps_3.48 //
GS40yrasprpu:728: aṣṭādaśa ca kuṣṭhāni nihantyeva na saṃśayaḥ // YRps_3.51 //
GS40yrasprpu:732: śuddhaṃ rasaṃ gaṃdhakameva śuddhaṃ pṛthak samāṃśaṃ kuru yatnatastataḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:733: eraṃḍamūlasya rasena sūtaṃ tathādrikarṇyā svarasena mardayet // YRps_3.53 //
GS40yrasprpu:734: taṃ kākamācyāḥ svarasena piṣṭvā tathā ca taṃ dāḍimabījatoyaiḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:735: krameṇa sūtaṃ hi dinaiścaturbhiḥ śuddhatvamāyāti hi niścayena // YRps_3.54 //
GS40yrasprpu:736: tatastu gaṃdhaṃ khalu mārkavadravair vibhāvyamānaṃ kuru lohapātre /
GS40yrasprpu:737: pradrāvayettaṃ badarasya cāgninā praḍhālayed bhṛṃgarase trivāram // YRps_3.55 //
GS40yrasprpu:738: kāryā tataḥ kajjalikā vimardya tāṃ drāvayellohamaye supātre /
GS40yrasprpu:739: praḍhālayettāṃ kadalīdale hi saṃchādya cānyena dalena paścāt // YRps_3.56 //
GS40yrasprpu:740: tasyās tv adhordhvaṃ pradadīta gomayaṃ śītīkṛtā gavyaghṛtena bharjitā /
GS40yrasprpu:741: rogānaśeṣānmaladoṣajātān hinasti caiṣā rasaparpaṭī hi // YRps_3.57 //
GS40yrasprpu:742: sā jīrakeṇaiva tu rāmaṭhena vātāmaśūlaṃ gṛhaṇīṃ sakāmalām /
GS40yrasprpu:743: gulmāni cāṣṭāvudarāṇi hanyāt saṃsevitā śuddharasasya parpaṭī // YRps_3.58 //
GS40yrasprpu:744: mayāpi sadvaidyahitāya nūnaṃ pradarśiteyaṃ khalu roganāśinī // YRps_3.59 //
GS40yrasprpu:747: saṃśoṣya paścādapi hiṃgurājikā- śuṃṭhībhirebhiśca samaṃ vimardya // YRps_3.60 //
GS40yrasprpu:748: rasena sārdhaṃ hi kumārikāyā mūṣāṃ vidadhyādravigharmaśoṣitām /
GS40yrasprpu:749: tasyāṃ nidhāyātha rasasya golakaṃ taṃ sveditaṃ cāmlarasena samyak // YRps_3.61 //
GS40yrasprpu:754: pratirasaṃ ca viśoṣya hi bhakṣayed raktikādvayamitaṃ rujāpaham /
GS40yrasprpu:756: jāyate'dhikataraṃ guṇena vai sannipātabhavamūrcchanaṃ jayet // YRps_3.64 //
GS40yrasprpu:757: yaḥ śrīsūtavarasya sevanamidaṃ nityaṃ karotīha vai dīrghāyurdhanadhānyadharmasahitaḥ prāpnoti saukhyaṃ param /
GS40yrasprpu:758: loke kīrtiparaṃparāṃ vitanute dharme matirjāyate prānte tasya parā gatirhi niyataṃ satyaṃ śivenoditam // YRps_3.65 //
GS40yrasprpu:762: anubhūtaṃ mayā kiṃcit kiṃcit śāstrānusārataḥ // YRps_4.1 //
GS40yrasprpu:765: tāmraṃ caivāśmasāraṃ ca nāgavaṃgau tathaiva // YRps_4.2 //
GS40yrasprpu:768: ete'ṣṭau dhātavo jñeyā lohānyevaṃ bhavanti hi // YRps_4.3 //
GS40yrasprpu:771: anye trayaḥ suvarṇasya prakārāḥ santi noditāḥ // YRps_4.4 //
GS40yrasprpu:779: rūpyādiyogena yadā miśraṃ svarṇaṃ hi jāyate /
GS40yrasprpu:780: hemakāryaṃ na cettena tadā śodhyaṃ bhiṣagvaraiḥ // YRps_4.7 //
GS40yrasprpu:786: evaṃ puṭatrayaṃ dattvā śuddhaṃ hema samuddharet // YRps_4.10 //
GS40yrasprpu:787: na tu śuddhasya hemnaśca śodhanaṃ kārayedbhiṣak /
GS40yrasprpu:788: anyeṣāmeva lohānāṃ śodhanaṃ kārayed bhiṣak // YRps_4.11 //
GS40yrasprpu:790: tataḥ svarṇabhavaṃ patraṃ tāpitaṃ hi vinikṣipet /
GS40yrasprpu:792: guruṇā kathitaṃ samyak nirutthaṃ jāyate dhruvam /
GS40yrasprpu:793: rogānhinasti sakalān nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // YRps_4.13 //
GS40yrasprpu:797: saṃpuṭe ca tato rundhyāt puṭayeddaśabhiḥ puṭaiḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:798: mriyate nātra saṃdeho nirutthaṃ bhasma jāyate // YRps_4.15 //
GS40yrasprpu:800: hemnaḥ sūkṣmadalāni bhūrjasadṛśānyādāya saṃlepya vai vajrīdugdhakahiṅguhiṅgulasamair ekatra piṣṭīkṛtaiḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:801: satyaṃ saṃpuṭake nidhāya daśabhiścaivaṃ puṭaiḥ kukkuṭaiḥ pācyaṃ hema ca raktagairikasamaṃ saṃjāyate niścitam // YRps_4.17 //
GS40yrasprpu:804: vidrute hemni nikṣiptaṃ svarṇabhūtiprabhaṃ bhavet // YRps_4.17 //
GS40yrasprpu:806: mardayed dinam ekaṃ tu saṃpuṭe dhārayettataḥ // YRps_4.18 //
GS40yrasprpu:808: jāyate nātra saṃdeho raṃjanaṃ kurute dhruvam /
GS40yrasprpu:809: dehaṃ lohaṃ ca matimān sudhanī sādhayedidam // YRps_4.19 //
GS40yrasprpu:811: etatsvarṇabhavaṃ karotica rajaḥ saundaryatāṃ vai sadā rogāndaivakṛtān nihanti sakalānyevaṃ tridoṣodbhavān /
GS40yrasprpu:812: yaḥ seveta naraḥ samān dvidaśakān vṛddhaśca no jāyate doṣāścaiva garodbhavā viṣakṛtā āgantujā naiva hi // YRps_4.20 //
GS40yrasprpu:814: rūpyaṃ ca trividhaṃ proktaṃ khanijaṃ sahajaṃ tathā /
GS40yrasprpu:815: kṛtrimaṃ ca trayo bhedāḥ kathitāḥ pūrvasūribhiḥ // YRps_4.21 //
GS40yrasprpu:817: bhūdhare kutra cetprāptaṃ khanyamāne ca khanijam /
GS40yrasprpu:823: yadrūpyaṃ vahninā taptam ujjvalaṃ hi viniḥsaret /
GS40yrasprpu:824: tacchuddhaṃ kaladhūtaṃ hi sarvakāryakaraṃ param // YRps_4.23 //
GS40yrasprpu:826: tāmrādisaṃsargabhavaṃ tvaśuddhaṃ rūpyaṃ hi miśraṃ khalu doṣalaṃ ca /
GS40yrasprpu:827: tacchodhayedvai bhasitasya mūṣyāṃ sīsena sārdhaṃ rajataṃ tu dhmāpayet // YRps_4.24 //
GS40yrasprpu:829: śanair vidhamyamānaṃ hi doṣaśūnyaṃ prajāyate // YRps_4.25 //
GS40yrasprpu:834: mardayed dinamekaṃ tu satataṃ nimbuvāriṇā // YRps_4.27 //
GS40yrasprpu:836: mūṣāmadhye tu tāṃ muktvā adhordhvaṃ gaṃdhakaṃ nyaset // YRps_4.28 //
GS40yrasprpu:838: pācitāṃ tu prayatnena svāṃgaśītalatāṃ gatām // YRps_4.29 //
GS40yrasprpu:841: anena vidhinā samyak rajataṃ mriyate dhruvam /
GS40yrasprpu:846: puṭādhikyaṃ hi lohānāṃ samyak syād guṇakāri ca /
GS40yrasprpu:854: tāmraṃ cāpi dvidhā proktaṃ nepālaṃ mlecchadeśajam /
GS40yrasprpu:855: nepāladeśajād anyan mlecchaṃ tatkathitaṃ budhaiḥ // YRps_4.35 //
GS40yrasprpu:863: vimardya nimbutoyena tāni patrāṇi lepayet // YRps_4.38 //
GS40yrasprpu:868: tālakena tadardhena śilayā ca tadardhayā // YRps_4.40 //
GS40yrasprpu:871: uparyupari patrāṇi kajjalīṃ ca nidhāpayet // YRps_4.42 //
GS40yrasprpu:873: svāṃgaśītaṃ samuttārya khalve sūkṣmaṃ pracūrṇayet // YRps_4.43 //
GS40yrasprpu:877: tatsamāṃśasya gaṃdhasya pāradasya samasya ca // YRps_4.45 //
GS40yrasprpu:889: śuddhaṃ śulvaṃ gaṃdhakaṃ vai samāṃśaṃ pūrvaṃ sthālyāṃ sthāpayedgaṃdhakārdham /
GS40yrasprpu:890: madhye śulbaṃ sthāpanīyaṃ prayatnāt tasyordhvaṃ vai gaṃdhacūrṇasya cārdham // YRps_4.51 //
GS40yrasprpu:891: sthālīmukhe cūrṇaghaṭīṃ niveśya lepaṃ tathā saindhavamṛtsnayāpi /
GS40yrasprpu:892: cullyāṃ ca kuryādatha vahnimeva yāmatrayeṇaiva supācitaṃ bhavet // YRps_4.52 //
GS40yrasprpu:893: śītībhūtaṃ doṣahīnaṃ tadeva kṛtvā cūrṇaṃ gālitaṃ vastrakhaṇḍe /
GS40yrasprpu:894: sevyaṃ samyak caikavallapramāṇaṃ kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ hanti gulmapramehān // YRps_4.53 //
GS40yrasprpu:897: pariṇāmabhavaṃ śūlaṃ tathā cāṣṭavidhaṃ ca ruk // YRps_4.53* //
GS40yrasprpu:905: yathottaraṃ syād guṇavarṇahīnaṃ prakāśitaṃ vaidyavareṇa samyak /
GS40yrasprpu:906: kāṃtaṃ tathā tīkṣṇavaraṃ hi muṇḍaṃ lohaṃ bhavedvai trividhaṃ krameṇa // YRps_4.57 //
GS40yrasprpu:908: kāṃtaṃ caturdhā kila kathyate'tra tadromakaṃ bhrāmakacumbake ca /
GS40yrasprpu:909: saṃdrāvakaṃ śreṣṭhatamaṃ tathā hi saṃkathyate śāstravidai rasajñaiḥ // YRps_4.58 //
GS40yrasprpu:912: tebhyo yaddrāvitaṃ lohaṃ romakaṃ tatpracakṣate // YRps_4.59 //
GS40yrasprpu:914: yatra kvāpi girau śreṣṭhe labhyate bhrāmakopalaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:915: tasmājjātaṃ tu yallauhaṃ bhrāmakaṃ tadihocyate // YRps_4.60 //
GS40yrasprpu:918: na muñcatyeva satataṃ śivabhaktiṃ yathānugaḥ // YRps_4.61 //
GS40yrasprpu:920: himādrau labhyate duḥkhād yaḥ spṛṣṭo drāvayedayaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:921: suvarṇādīṃśca tadvaddhi tatkāṃtaṃ drāvakaṃ bhavet // YRps_4.62 //
GS40yrasprpu:923: śuddhe kāṃtabhave pātre śṛtaṃ dugdhaṃ hi nodgiret /
GS40yrasprpu:924: pānīyaṃ kvathitaṃ cāsmin hiṃgugaṃdhasamaṃ bhavet // YRps_4.63 //
GS40yrasprpu:926: lepo'pi naiva jāyeta śuddhakāṃtasya lakṣaṇam // YRps_4.64 //
GS40yrasprpu:928: koṭisaṃkhyāguṇaṃ proktaṃ cuṃbakaṃ drāvakaṃ tathā // YRps_4.65 //
GS40yrasprpu:931: kāṃtādisarvalohaṃ hi śudhyatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // YRps_4.66 //
GS40yrasprpu:934: nirvāpitaṃ bhavecchuddhaṃ satyaṃ guruvaco yathā // YRps_4.67 //
GS40yrasprpu:936: lohacūrṇaṃ ghṛtāktaṃ hi kṣiptvā lohasya kharpare /
GS40yrasprpu:938: khalve ca vipacettadvat pañcavāram ataḥ param /
GS40yrasprpu:939: varodakaiḥ puṭellohaṃ caturvāram idaṃ khalu // YRps_4.69 //
GS40yrasprpu:941: anena vidhinā kāryaṃ sarvalohasya sādhanam // YRps_4.70 //
GS40yrasprpu:946: peṣaṇaṃ tu prakartavyaṃ puṭaḥ paścātpradīyate // YRps_4.72 //
GS40yrasprpu:955: mriyate nātra saṃdeho hy anubhūtaṃ mayaiva hi // YRps_4.76 //
GS40yrasprpu:962: baṃgaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ khuraṃ miśraṃ tathaiva ca /
GS40yrasprpu:964: yacchuddhaṃ saralaṃ śubhraṃ khuraṃ tadabhidhīyate // YRps_4.79 //
GS40yrasprpu:969: takramadhye trivāraṃ hi miśraṃ baṃgaṃ viśudhyati // YRps_4.80 //
GS40yrasprpu:976: anena vidhinā śeṣam apakvaṃ mārayed dhruvam // YRps_4.83 //
GS40yrasprpu:978: athāparaḥ prakāro hi vakṣyate cādhunā mayā /
GS40yrasprpu:979: śuddhabaṃgasya patrāṇi samānyeva tu kārayet // YRps_4.84 //
GS40yrasprpu:980: ajāśakṛt varā tulyā cūrṇitā ca niśā tathā /
GS40yrasprpu:984: pūrvaṃ prakalpitaṃ cūrṇaṃ tatropari ca vinyaset /

GS40yrasprpu:2308: triṃśadvanopalaiḥ samyak puṭānyevaṃ hi viṃśatiḥ // YRps_11.59 //
GS40yrasprpu:2310: saptavarṇasavarṇaṃ hi jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // YRps_11.60 //
GS40yrasprpu:2313: catuṣṭaṃkamitā kāryā sphaṭikī nirmalā śubhā // YRps_11.61 //
GS40yrasprpu:2314: vṛścikālīrase ghṛṣṭā dinam ekaṃ tu vārtikaiḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:2315: paścācca śoṣayetsarvaṃ yantre ḍamaruke nyaset // YRps_11.62 //
GS40yrasprpu:2317: tanmadhye gartakaṃ kṛtvā gartake navasādaram // YRps_11.63 //
GS40yrasprpu:2319: sūtakopari sāraṃ hi pūrvoktaṃ ṭaṃkamānakam // YRps_11.64 //
GS40yrasprpu:2323: paścāt khalve nidhāyātha vṛścikālyā pramardayet // YRps_11.66 //
GS40yrasprpu:2330: ṭaṃkaṇaṃ śāṇamānaṃ hi tailenairaṇḍajena vai // YRps_11.69 //
GS40yrasprpu:2332: bhastrayā dhmāpayetsamyak lohaṃ rasanibhaṃ bhavet // YRps_11.70 //
GS40yrasprpu:2334: lohaṃ ca rasakaṃ paścād gālitaṃ vajramūṣayā // YRps_11.71 //
GS40yrasprpu:2340: veṣṭitaṃ narakeśena drute nāge nimajjitam // YRps_11.74 //
GS40yrasprpu:2344: gadyāṇe caturo vallān rūpyaṃ dattvā pragālayet /
GS40yrasprpu:2345: jāyate ruciraṃ tāraṃ satyam etadudīritam // YRps_11.76 //
GS40yrasprpu:2352: yavamātrāṃ guṭīṃ kṛtvā viśoṣya cātape khare // YRps_11.79 //
GS40yrasprpu:2355: svāṃgaśītaṃ samuttārya grāhyaṃ satvaṃ tad ūrdhvagam /
GS40yrasprpu:2356: sattvaṃ gadyāṇamekaṃ tu tanmātraṃ tārasaṃpuṭam // YRps_11.81 //
GS40yrasprpu:2358: sūtamātraṃ kṣārasattvaṃ sarvaṃ caikatra marditam // YRps_11.82 //
GS40yrasprpu:2359: svarasena tu ketakyā golaṃ kṛtvā viśoṣitam /
GS40yrasprpu:2360: tārasaṃpuṭamadhye tu dhāritaṃ taṃ ca golakam // YRps_11.83 //
GS40yrasprpu:2363: dhānyābhraṃ tulyaṃ paṃkena kṛtvā śrāvaṃ tu pūrayet /
GS40yrasprpu:2365: tāmraṃ dvādaśavallaṃ hi rūpyaṃ valladvayaṃ tathā /
GS40yrasprpu:2366: vaṃgaṃ vallamitaṃ śuddhaṃ sarvamekatra gālayet // YRps_11.86 //
GS40yrasprpu:2368: jāyate pravaraṃ tāraṃ satyam etad udīritam // YRps_11.87 //
GS40yrasprpu:2373: vaṃgaṃ tālakamabhrakaṃ śaśirasaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ viṣaṃ ṭaṃkaṇaṃ /
GS40yrasprpu:2374: traivāreṇa ca mūkamūṣadhamitaṃ vindanti candraprabham // YRps_11.89 //
GS40yrasprpu:2378: pāradasya trayo bhāgā bhāgaikaṃ rajatasya hi /
GS40yrasprpu:2379: nimbūrasena saṃmardya piṣṭīṃ kṛtvā prayatnataḥ // YRps_11.91 //
GS40yrasprpu:2383: tena vedhyaṃ drutaṃ tāmraṃ ṣoḍaśāṃśena yatnataḥ // YRps_11.93 //
GS40yrasprpu:2386: sūtakasya trayo bhāgā baṃgaṃ bhāgadvayaṃ tathā /
GS40yrasprpu:2404: anenaiva prakāreṇa punarevaṃ tu kārayet // YRps_11.103 //
GS40yrasprpu:2406: ṣoḍaśāṃśena śulbasya vedhaṃ kuryānna saṃśayaḥ // YRps_11.104 //
GS40yrasprpu:2408: pāradaṃ ṭaṃkamānaṃ tu lavaṇaṃ dviguṇaṃ tathā /
GS40yrasprpu:2409: khalve vimardayettāvad yāvannaṣṭo raso bhavet // YRps_11.105 //
GS40yrasprpu:2410: tāmraṃ gadyāṇakaṃ śuddhaṃ baṃgaṃ vallamitaṃ kuru /
GS40yrasprpu:2411: drute tāmre'tha lavaṇaṃ sūtakena samanvitam // YRps_11.106 //
GS40yrasprpu:2413: tadrūpye marditaṃ sūtaṃ kṣeptavyaṃ jalayantrake // YRps_11.107 //
GS40yrasprpu:2414: tattrayodaśakaṃ rūpyaṃ jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // YRps_11.108 //
GS40yrasprpu:2416: tālena nihataṃ baṃgaṃ tadbaṃgena tu rūpyakam /
GS40yrasprpu:2418: vallaṃ gadyāṇake dadyād baṃgaṃ stambhayate dhruvam // YRps_11.109 //
GS40yrasprpu:2425: kuryāddaradakhaṇḍena samaṃ sīsaṃ ca dāpayet // YRps_11.112 //
GS40yrasprpu:2427: bhasma mūṣopari nyasya dhmāpayecca śanaiḥ śanaiḥ // YRps_11.113 //
GS40yrasprpu:2428: śuddhaśaṅkhanibhaṃ rūpyaṃ niṣkamātraṃ hi niḥsaret // YRps_11.114 //
GS40yrasprpu:2430: dvipalaṃ śuddhasūtaṃ ca dvipalaṃ rasakasya ca /
GS40yrasprpu:2431: tālakaṃ ca paladvaṃdvaṃ surmilaṃ yugmamātrakam // YRps_11.115 //
GS40yrasprpu:2434: kūpīmukhe tu yallagnaṃ sattvaṃ grāhyaṃ prayatnataḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:2437: sūtakaṃ palamekaṃ tu śaṃkhābhaṃ surmilaṃ palam /
GS40yrasprpu:2438: eraṇḍataile ghṛṣṭaṃ tad dhāritaṃ kharpare vare // YRps_11.118 //
GS40yrasprpu:2440: paścāccullyāṃ samāropya vahniṃ kuryācchanaiḥ śanaiḥ // YRps_11.119 //
GS40yrasprpu:2441: sārdhaṃ yāmaṃ tataḥ pācyaṃ svāṃgaśītaṃ samuddharet /
GS40yrasprpu:2442: tāmrapātre tu yallagnaṃ sarvaṃ sattvaṃ samāharet // YRps_11.120 //
GS40yrasprpu:2444: deyaṃ tadvallamātraṃ hi drute tāmre tu sattvakam // YRps_11.121 //
GS40yrasprpu:2445: śaṃkhābhaṃ jāyate tāraṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // YRps_11.122 //
GS40yrasprpu:2447: tālaṃ tāmraṃ rītighoṣaṃ samāṃśaṃ kuryādevaṃ gālitaṃ ḍhālitaṃ hi /
GS40yrasprpu:2448: amle varge saptavāraṃ praḍhālya paścādyojyaṃ tulyabhāge ca rūpye /
GS40yrasprpu:2449: śuddhaṃ rūpyaṃ ṣoḍaśākhyaṃ hi samyak jātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ nānṛtaṃ satyametat // YRps_11.123 //
GS40yrasprpu:2452: svacche sūtavare vallaṃ nikṣiptaṃ rūpyakṛdbhavet // YRps_11.124 //
GS40yrasprpu:2463: anena vidhinā pūryā dvitīyā mūṣikā śubhā // YRps_11.129 //
GS40yrasprpu:2465: sūtakaṃ bandham āyāti vaṅgābhaṃ tu prajāyate /
GS40yrasprpu:2466: drutadrāvaṃ ghātasahaṃ dṛṣṭamevaṃ mayā khalu // YRps_11.130 //
GS40yrasprpu:2472: mauktikāni hi jāyante kṛtānyevaṃ mayā khalu // YRps_11.133 //
GS40yrasprpu:2475: mauktikāni tu sūkṣmāṇi nimbūdrāve nidhāpayet // YRps_11.134 //
GS40yrasprpu:2477: tasya paṃkasya guṭikāṃ masṛṇāṃ tu prakārayet // YRps_11.135 //
GS40yrasprpu:2479: catvāri kāṃsyabhāṇḍāni caturdikṣu gatāni ca // YRps_11.136 //
GS40yrasprpu:2481: badhyate mauktikaṃ śreṣṭha- taraṃ sarvaguṇairyutam // YRps_11.137 //
GS40yrasprpu:2483: śuddhaśaṅkhasya cūrṇaṃ hi sūkṣmaṃ kṛtvā prayatnataḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:2486: vartiṃ vidhāya matimān kārpāsāsthiṣu svedayet // YRps_11.139 //
GS40yrasprpu:2487: svāṃgaśītaṃ samuttārya pravālaṃ ruciraṃ bhavet // YRps_11.140 //
GS40yrasprpu:2494: kuṃkumaṃ kesaraṃ caiva jātīpatraṃ śatāvarī // YRps_12.2 //
GS40yrasprpu:2496: śṛṅgāṭakaṃ karṣamitaṃ kuryādevaṃ pṛthak pṛthak // YRps_12.3 //
GS40yrasprpu:2498: vaṭakān kārayet paścāt karṣamātrān vipācayet // YRps_12.4 //
GS40yrasprpu:2500: mākṣike ghṛtamāne vai mukhaṃ rundhyāddinatrayam // YRps_12.5 //
GS40yrasprpu:2502: saptakāni ca pañcaivam āhāraṃ madhuraṃ bhajet // YRps_12.6 //
GS40yrasprpu:2503: dugdhaudanaṃ tathā rātrau kṣāramamlaṃ ca varjayet /
GS40yrasprpu:2504: retaḥkṣayī tathā klībo gacchecca pramadāśatam // YRps_12.7 //
GS40yrasprpu:2508: śatāvarīṃ kṣīravidārikāṃ ca prasthārdhamānāṃ pṛthageva kuryāt /
GS40yrasprpu:2509: rasaṃ tathā śālmalimadhyamūlāt prasthaṃ sitārdhāḍhakamatra deyam // YRps_12.9 //
GS40yrasprpu:2510: supācitaṃ vai mṛduvahninā tathā darvīpralepo'pi hi jāyate yathā /
GS40yrasprpu:2511: tvakpatrakailāḥ saha kesareṇa palapramāṇā hi tato vidadhyāt // YRps_12.10 //
GS40yrasprpu:2512: lehe suśīte madhu bilvamātraṃ prātaḥ prabhakṣediha karṣamātram // YRps_12.11 //
GS40yrasprpu:2515: cūrṇīkṛtaṃ gālitameva vastrād bhṛṣṭaṃ tathājyena sitāsametam // YRps_12.12 //
GS40yrasprpu:2517: lehaṃ sujātaṃ khalu bhakṣayettat karṣapramāṇaṃ nitarāṃ prabhāte /
GS40yrasprpu:2518: kāmasya bodhaṃ kurute hi śīghraṃ nārīṃ ramedvai caṭakāyate'sau // YRps_12.13 //
GS40yrasprpu:2521: saṃcūrṇya sarvaṃ pṛthageva pālikaṃ kṣīreṇa pācyaṃ daśabhāgakena // YRps_12.14 //
GS40yrasprpu:2522: sitā pradeyā daśapālikātra pākaṃ vidadhyādapi cāgniyogāt /
GS40yrasprpu:2523: madhuplutaṃ bhakṣitamardhayāmāt kāmapradīptiṃ kurute sadaiva // YRps_12.15 //
GS40yrasprpu:2524: vīryasya vṛddhiṃ jaṭharāgnivṛddhiṃ kāmāgnivṛddhiṃ sahasā karoti // YRps_12.16 //
GS40yrasprpu:2527: jīvakarṣabhakau jīvāṃ medāṃ vṛddhiṃ śatāvarīm // YRps_12.17 //
GS40yrasprpu:2529: rase tasminghṛtaprasthaṃ gavyaṃ daśaguṇaṃ payaḥ // YRps_12.18 //
GS40yrasprpu:2544: dugdhamadhye vipācyainaṃ dinānyevaṃ hi pañca ca // YRps_13.3 //
GS40yrasprpu:2546: guṭikā kolamātrā hi bhakṣaṇīyā niśāmukhe // YRps_13.4 //
GS40yrasprpu:2550: kuṅkumaṃ svarṇabījaṃ ca dhūrtaparṇaṃ prasūnakam // YRps_13.6 //
GS40yrasprpu:2552: godugdhe śodhanīyaṃ ca bhāgamekaṃ prakalpayet // YRps_13.7 //
GS40yrasprpu:2557: jātīphalārkakarahāṭalavaṅgaśuṇṭhīkaṅkolakeśarakaṇāharicandanāni etaiḥ samānamahiphenamanena cābhraṃ śvetaṃ nidhāya madhunā vaṭakān vidadhyāt /
GS40yrasprpu:2558: māṣadvayonmitamamuṃ niśi bhakṣayitvā mṛṣṭaṃ payastadanu māhiṣamāśu pītvā kurvantu kāmukajanāḥ pratiruddhapātāścetāṃsi tāni cakitāni kalāvatīnām // YRps_13.10 //
GS40yrasprpu:2564: yāmārdhaṃ dhārayedbinduṃ satyaṃ guruvaco yathā // YRps_13.13 //
GS40yrasprpu:2566: postakaṃ palamekaṃ vai śuṃṭhīkarṣaḥ sitā palaikā ca /
GS40yrasprpu:2567: karṣamitā tvakpayasā pītaṃ reto dhruvaṃ dhatte // YRps_13.14 //
GS40yrasprpu:2569: sadvaidyena yaśodhareṇa kavinā vidvajjanānandakṛd grantho'yaṃ grathitaḥ karotu satataṃ saukhyaṃ satāṃ mānase // YRps_13.15 //
GS40yrasprpu:2570: deśānāṃ surarāṣṭram uttamatamaṃ tatrāpi jīrṇābhidhaḥ prākāro'sti sa vedaśāstraniratairvipraiśca saṃśobhitaḥ /
GS40yrasprpu:2571: tasmin śaṃbhupadāravindaratikṛcchrīpadmanābhaḥ svayam tatputreṇa yaśodhareṇa kavinā graṃthaḥ svayaṃ nirmitaḥ // YRps_13.16 //
GS40yrasprpu:2572: saṃbodhāya satāṃ sukhāya sarujāṃ śiṣyārthasaṃsiddhaye vaidyānāmupajīvanāya viduṣām udveganāśāya vai /
GS40yrasprpu:2573: śrīmaddurgapurātane 'tinipuṇaḥ śrīpadmanābhātmajaḥ śrīmadbhaṭṭayaśodharaḥ kavivaro granthaḥ svayaṃ nirmame // YRps_13.17 //
